summary: Removes the out-of-menu key prompts such as open.
descriptionHtml:
What always annoyed me in skyrim was the key prompts. I really dont need to be told to press space whenever i want to open something or talk to people; after the 100th time i can remember. That is why i made this mod. 

So far, it only works for key prompts out of menu, such as the open prompt, as the simple deletion of textures is not enough to remove these promts as they are part of the menu. When i figure out how to edit these, i will remove them as well, but so far i hav had no luck.

Now compatible with xbox360 and ps3 controllers

This will work with watever key bindings you have.

Installation:
Just place all of these files into your skyrim data folder located

C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

or

C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

for 32 bit systems

The process of removing the prompts from the menues is longer and more arduous. I will eventually get around to it, so look for updates in the future.
author: Arfien
